basic_info.name: Maharaj Vijayaram Gajapathi Raj College of Engineering Placement
description: Maharaj Vijayaram Gajapathi Raj College of Engineering (MVGRCE) has created a record of 70% placement rate recently. Total placements made by the college are 706 with 103 companies visiting the campus for recruitment. 706 is a good number for MVGRCE because if looking at past records of the college, in 2017-18 placements only 510 students got placement, in 2016-17 only 523 students got placed, and in 2015-16 placements, the number was 577.
Talking about the recent placements, are some highlights:
Previous records of the college is also been good in terms of placements. Here are some more highlights from the NIRF report of 2019.
Median Salary offered to them is as follows:
Undergraduate students are offered higher CTC than Postgraduate students. The median package range between 2-3 lacs which means 20-22k per month. For start-ups, the amount is not bad.
In 2018-19 placements students were offered a salary package up to 28 lacs per annum by companies such as Amazon, Mu- Sigma, Accolite, MyMoney Karma, Toppr, Accolite.

basic_info.name: About Maharaj Vijayaram Gajapathi Raj College of Engineering
Maharaj Vijayaram Gajapathi Raj College of Engineering FAQ

faqs.question: Is MVGR best for Mechanical Engineering?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is a good course to study. Here are some notable reasons for joining MVGRCE college for mechanical engineering and not any other college:The College has an Autonomous status and has good achievements.The faculty in the department are all Ph.D. degree holders or pursuing one.The college has the legacy of staying in race with the colleges all over India by participating in all India competitions like Baja, Supra, Go-kart, etc., through which you will be getting a hands-on experience on the Automobile or any other machine you are obliged to build.The labs for curriculum are another pride of MVGRCE(A), they are done with full responsibility and accuracy than any other institution around.Students are given several facilities for easy classroom experience, in case of any difficulty, you can always have a face to face interactions with the Head of the Department.

faqs.question: Does MVGRCE provide hostel accommodation to its students?
faqs.answer: Yes, the college provides hostel facilities to students. There is separate accommodation for boys and girls with double occupancy for boys and double & triple occupancy for girls. Both hostels are facilitated with:R.O. Drinking-Water facilityIn house Laundry servicesSpacious and well-furnished dining hallsModern kitchen with clean and hygienic ecosystemA separate recreation center with Audio, Video and T.V. facilitiesIn house digital library with 250 Mbps internet facilityA separate Gym facility within the hostel campusA separate Power back-up with GeneratorRooms for visiting parents/guardians for overnight stayIn house medical service supportSolar hot water facility

Section.name: About MVGRCE
Section.description:
Maharaj Vijayaram Gajapathi Raj College of Engineering (MVGRCE) is an affiliation of Jawaharlal Nehru Technical University, Kakinada. It is ranked at 76th position among Top 100 private Engineering Institute by i3RC Times Rankings in 2018. The college offers B.Tech, MBA, and M.Tech to its applicants for Undergraduate and Postgraduate admissions respectively. In addition, it also offers some Ph.D. programs in MECH, ECE, CSE, CHEM, CIV. The placement rate of MVGRCE is 70% with 28 LPA as the highest CTC and 5 LPA as the average CTC offered to students by companies like Amazon, Mu- Sigma, Jaro Education, Hansa Solutions, Riktam Technology, Effftronics, Nine Leaps, etc.
Other than the i3RC Times rankings:
The college offers a total of 18 courses under three programs, bifurcation of the same is in the table below:
The fee structure for the same as per AFRC 2017-18 is given below. The fee may change every year but the below table will give you an estimate of the fee charges at the college:
Admissions at MVGRCE are entrance based.
The mode of application for the various entrance exams is online and the applicants can register themselves by visiting on their official websites.
